recipe.title: Mixed Berry Spinach Salad With Strawberry Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ; sweet apple, cored, halved and thinly sliced
¼ cup ; extra virgin olive oil ; (60 mL)

steps.step: For the dressing, push a straw through the strawberries from the tip to the green top to remove the hull. (Or you can cut it off with a knife!)
Add the rest of the dressing ingredients.
Cut strawberries, apple, and onion into slices.
Combine all the salad ingredients in a large bowl.
Drizzle with desired amount of dressing and toss to coat. (Spinach wilts easily, don’t add dressing until ready to eat!)
Sprinkle feta cheese on top and serve.
